person.persName: Peter S. Anderson (Mason County, Kentucky, farmer and trader.)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer and trader. Mason County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary Patton Anderson. Farmer and trader in Mason County, Kentucky in 1860. Father of Leonard Anderson, Elizabeth Anderson, Thomas Anderson, Amanda Anderson Dobyns. Lewis Anderson, and Mollie Anderson Osborne. Obituary states that he was "among the wealthiest citizens and largest slaveholders in the county" before the Civil War. Farmer in Mason County, Kentucky in 1850. Employed John Mehatt and James Madden as farm workers in 1850. Farmer and trader in Mason County, Kentucky in 1860.
